etymology.description: 日(日) (rì, "day") + 报(報) (bào, "report; newspaper") = daily report or newspaper. 日報(日報) (rìbào, "daily newspaper") refers to a newspaper that is published every day.
etymology.interpretation: A 日報(日報) (rìbào, "daily newspaper") is a publication that provides news and information on a daily basis, emphasizing the frequency of release to keep the audience updated with the latest happenings.

examples.chinese: 我每天读日报(我每天讀日報)。
examples.english: I read the daily newspaper every day.

examples.chinese: 因为工作忙(因爲工作忙)，我每天抽时间看日报(我每天抽時間看日報)。
examples.pinyin: yīnwèi gōngzuò máng, wǒ měitiān chōu shíjiān kàn rìbào.
examples.english: Because work is busy, I take time every day to read the daily newspaper.
